cardContent.title: What is Blockchain Technology?
cardContent.description: If you're not sure about what blockchain is or how it works, this post uses Wikipedia as a metaphor to explain blockchain technology.

cardContent.title: Why Blockchain is Hard?
cardContent.description: Jimmy Song goes briefly into what a blockchain is, then devles into what the challenges are when developing on decentralized systems.

cardContent.title: The Blockchain Application Stack
cardContent.description: Joel shares his thoughts on how blockchain will affect the architecture of internet applications in the future and how that would look.

cardContent.title: How Does Ethereum Work, Anyway?
cardContent.description: Preethi, a Blockchain Engineer, goes into great detail about what Ethereum is. This post covers important Ethereum concepts like gas, proof of work, and more.

title: Why Tokens are Eating the World
alt: Why Tokens are Eating the World

cardContent.title: Why Tokens are Eating the World
cardContent.description: A primer on cryptocurrencies in the context of fiat currencies and how these markets work. An essential read for those who want to better understand tokens!

cardContent.title: Building for the Blockchain
cardContent.description: Once you understand what blockchain is and how Ethereum works, here's how blockchain is different from existing development paradigms and how to get started.
